ygData.subject: RE: OT - clip frame?
ygData.msgSnippet: Unimplemented as of yet. It will eventually be for adjusting the distant vertical plane that doesn t allow things further than it from being drawn. Eventually
ygData.messageBody:
Unimplemented as of yet. It will eventually be for adjusting the distant
vertical plane that doesn't allow things further than it from being drawn.
Eventually you will be able to set it way out and make things more
believable in a graphics sense.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
